Interests

While not an exhaustive list of the topics you can expect me to write about here on my blog, these are the things that I often find interesting or tend to write about more heavily:

  • Free (libre) software
  • Decentralization and federated platforms
  • Right to repair
  • Bluetooth devices (reviews and recommendations)
  • Linux-compatible hardware
  • Minimalism
  • Frugal living / simple living
  • Environmentalism
  • Privacy and digital rights
  • Kidney Disease / IgA Nephropathy
